title: noobshow
author: noobshow
content: The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and debugging responsive web and mobile applications for the company. Using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, this candidate will be able to translate user and business needs into functional frontend design.An ideal candidate has- Strong knowledge of web technologies- Deep understanding of crypto, blockchain or web3 technologies- Experience developing features for a mass-market consumer productResponsibilities- Review the client code of other developers- Integrate back- and front-end components- Work with the team to develop new features- Build reusable code and libraries for future use- Adapt to and learn new technologies and frameworks- Take part in overall design, architecture and tech stack discussions- Build pixel-perfect front-ends from design and interaction mockups- Designing, developing, and testing UI for mobile and web applications- Accurately translate user and business needs into functional frontend codeQualifications- 2+ years' experience in frontend development- Familiarity using Scrum/Agile development methodologies- Previous experience in the crypto/blockchain and/or fintech industry- Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Computer Science(or self-taught experience)- Experience building object oriented web applications in JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3Role and responsibilitiesYou need to have a strong interest in (and ideally experience with) blockchain, Ethereum and/or Bitcoin. In this role you will implement and maintain features that might interact with crypto wallet(s).Salary Information:Salary can be paid with mixture of cash and crypto or either of both(as preferred by the employee)Projected Salary Range is Between $35k-$90k yearly, including other benefits.Note:The wide salary range indicates our targeted employee has no limits, from amateur to highly experienced employee.Crypto and/or defi experience is a requirementApply through this link or chat with me on reddit
